import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FaGithub, FaLinkedin, FaFacebook, FaGlobe, FaReact, FaDatabase, FaMagic } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { SiFramer } from 'react-icons/si'; import './AboutPage.css'; function AboutPage() { // Initialize all cards as unflipped by default const [flippedCards, setFlippedCards] = useState({ about: false, usage: false, creator: false, tech: false }); const [isDealing, setIsDealing] = useState(true); const [magicActive, setMagicActive] = useState(false); // This will now only show the flip animation but not change the persisted state const toggleCard = (card) => { setMagicActive(true); setTimeout(() => setMagicActive(false), 1000); }; useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => setIsDealing(false), 1500); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (
{/* All cards remain unflipped by default */}
toggleCard('about')} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0s', '--card-color': '#6a4bff' }} >
📖
📖
✨

What is FlashQuiz?

The Magic Behind FlashQuiz

FlashQuiz transforms mundane learning into an elegant performance through card-based memory magic.

Our system uses scientifically-proven spaced repetition techniques wrapped in an engaging magical interface to make learning stick.

#LearningMagic #SpacedRepetition
toggleCard('usage')} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0.2s', '--card-color': '#ff6b6b' }} >
📝
📝
🔮

How to Use

Master the Magic

  • Create Decks - Build custom card decks for any subject
  • Study - Flip cards to reveal answers and rate your knowledge
  • Track Progress - Our algorithm shows you cards at optimal intervals
  • Share - Export decks to share with fellow learners
#ProTips #StudyHacks
toggleCard('creator')} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0.4s', '--card-color': '#50c9ba' }} >

👨‍💻

The Creator

Masrafi - The Memory Magician

Full-stack developer with a passion for creating elegant, effective learning tools.

Believes in making education engaging through thoughtful design and interactive experiences.

#Developer #Designer
toggleCard('tech')} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0.6s', '--card-color': '#ffa34d' }} >

Tech Stack

Magical Technologies

  • ReactJS

    Frontend UI with magical animations

  • Framer Motion

    Beautiful transitions and interactions

  • IndexedDB

    Client-side storage for your decks

#ModernWeb #PWA

No accounts • No ads • Pure learning magic

); } export default AboutPage;
